desc.en: Aru grapples with the thought of using funds acquired by the Foreclosure Task Force to attack Abydos High School. To lift her spirits, Problem Solver takes her to get Shiba Seki ramen. Meanwhile, a man in a black suit appears before Hoshino with a clandestine proposal.
desc.jp: Aru grapples with the thought of using funds acquired by the Foreclosure Task Force to attack Abydos High School. To lift her spirits, Problem Solver takes her to get Shiba Seki ramen. Meanwhile, a man in a black suit appears before Hoshino with a clandestine proposal.
desc.thai: Aru grapples with the thought of using funds acquired by the Foreclosure Task Force to attack Abydos High School. To lift her spirits, Problem Solver takes her to get Shiba Seki ramen. Meanwhile, a man in a black suit appears before Hoshino with a clandestine proposal.
desc.ko: Aru grapples with the thought of using funds acquired by the Foreclosure Task Force to attack Abydos High School. To lift her spirits, Problem Solver takes her to get Shiba Seki ramen. Meanwhile, a man in a black suit appears before Hoshino with a clandestine proposal.
desc.zh_tw: 亞瑠用向對策委員會成员取得的钱攻击阿拜多斯高中。对此，亞瑠感到良心的谴责而苦恼不断。为了鼓励无精打采的亞瑠，便利屋职员们一同前往柴关拉面店。另一方面，身穿黑色西装的男人出现在星野面前，向她提出秘密交易。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阿露用向对策委员会成员取得的钱攻击阿拜多斯高中。对此，阿露感到良心的谴责而苦恼不断。为了鼓励无精打采的阿露，便利屋职员们一同前往柴关拉面店。另一方面，身穿黑色西装的男人出现在星野面前，向她提出秘密交易。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 亚瑠用向对策委员会成员取得的钱攻击阿拜多斯高中。对此，亚瑠感到良心的谴责而苦恼不断。为了鼓励无精打采的亚瑠，便利屋职员们一同前往柴关拉面店。另一方面，身穿黑色西装的男人出现在星野面前，向她提出秘密交易。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 爱露用向对策委员会成员取得的钱攻击阿拜多斯高中。对此，爱露感到良心的谴责而苦恼不断。为了鼓励无精打采的爱露，便利屋职员们一同前往柴关拉面店。另一方面，身穿黑色西装的男人出现在星野面前，向她提出秘密交易。

desc.en: Aru is worried all night about another attack against Abydos. Haruka already set the bombs in place. Mutsuki can't understand why Aru doesn't take the money first, and Aru says it is because of the concern on being interfering too much by the customer.
desc.jp: Aru is worried all night about another attack against Abydos. Haruka already set the bombs in place. Mutsuki can't understand why Aru doesn't take the money first, and Aru says it is because of the concern on being interfering too much by the customer.
desc.thai: Aru is worried all night about another attack against Abydos. Haruka already set the bombs in place. Mutsuki can't understand why Aru doesn't take the money first, and Aru says it is because of the concern on being interfering too much by the customer.
desc.ko: Aru is worried all night about another attack against Abydos. Haruka already set the bombs in place. Mutsuki can't understand why Aru doesn't take the money first, and Aru says it is because of the concern on being interfering too much by the customer.
desc.zh_tw: 亞瑠一整晚对再战阿拜多斯一行人而担忧，遙香则布置好了炸弹。無月不解为什么亞瑠不先收钱办事，亞瑠则说是怕被客户干涉太多。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阿露一整晚对再战阿拜多斯一行人而担忧，遥香则布置好了炸弹。睦月不解为什么阿露不先收钱办事，阿露则说是怕被客户干涉太多。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 亚瑠一整晚对再战阿拜多斯一行人而担忧，遥香则布置好了炸弹。无月不解为什么亚瑠不先收钱办事，亚瑠则说是怕被客户干涉太多。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 爱露一整晚对再战阿拜多斯一行人而担忧，春香则布置好了炸弹。睦月不解为什么爱露不先收钱办事，爱露则说是怕被客户干涉太多。

desc.en: Someone purposes to get back to Gehenna, yet by Kayoko's careful analysis, that the existence of the Prefect Team, especially Hina, will make them impossible to win and therefore impractical to go back.
desc.jp: Someone purposes to get back to Gehenna, yet by Kayoko's careful analysis, that the existence of the Prefect Team, especially Hina, will make them impossible to win and therefore impractical to go back.
desc.thai: Someone purposes to get back to Gehenna, yet by Kayoko's careful analysis, that the existence of the Prefect Team, especially Hina, will make them impossible to win and therefore impractical to go back.
desc.ko: Someone purposes to get back to Gehenna, yet by Kayoko's careful analysis, that the existence of the Prefect Team, especially Hina, will make them impossible to win and therefore impractical to go back.
desc.zh_tw: 中间有人提出了回到格黑娜的选项，但佳世子谨慎分析了形势，认为由于有風紀委員會，尤其是阳奈的存在，他们几乎没有胜算，回去其实挺不实际的。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 中间有人提出了回到歌赫娜的选项，但佳代子谨慎分析了形势，认为由于有风纪委员会，尤其是阳奈的存在，他们几乎没有胜算，回去其实挺不实际的。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 中间有人提出了回到格黑娜的选项，但佳世子谨慎分析了形势，认为由于有风纪委员会，尤其是阳奈的存在，他们几乎没有胜算，回去其实挺不实际的。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 中间有人提出了回到格黑娜的选项，但佳代子谨慎分析了形势，认为由于有风纪委员会，尤其是阳奈的存在，他们几乎没有胜算，回去其实挺不实际的。

name.ko: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_tw: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

desc.en: Sensei meets Nonomi and Hoshino at the Committee room. Hoshino leaves in advance due to her own business. Nonomi then talks about former Hoshino and her senior.
desc.jp: Sensei meets Nonomi and Hoshino at the Committee room. Hoshino leaves in advance due to her own business. Nonomi then talks about former Hoshino and her senior.
desc.thai: Sensei meets Nonomi and Hoshino at the Committee room. Hoshino leaves in advance due to her own business. Nonomi then talks about former Hoshino and her senior.
desc.ko: Sensei meets Nonomi and Hoshino at the Committee room. Hoshino leaves in advance due to her own business. Nonomi then talks about former Hoshino and her senior.
desc.zh_tw: 老师在對策委員會的教室遇见了野乃美与星野。星夜有事先行离开了。野乃美随后跟老师提起了以前的星野以及她的前辈。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师在对策委员会的教室遇见了野宫与星野。星夜有事先行离开了。野宫随后跟老师提起了以前的星野以及她的前辈。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 老师在对策委员会的教室遇见了野乃美与星野。星夜有事先行离开了。野乃美随后跟老师提起了以前的星野以及她的前辈。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 老师在对策委员会的教室遇见了野宫与星野。星夜有事先行离开了。野宫随后跟老师提起了以前的星野以及她的前辈。

desc.en: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.jp: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.thai: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.ko: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第十首曲子，主要用于羁绊故事中。
desc.zh_tw: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.

hobby.jp: 昼寝、ゴロゴロすること

desc.en: Hoshino leaves school and has a meeting with the Black Suit. Black Suit repurposes the so-called "proposal", claiming to give her "a condition that she'll never be able to decline".
desc.jp: Hoshino leaves school and has a meeting with the Black Suit. Black Suit repurposes the so-called "proposal", claiming to give her "a condition that she'll never be able to decline".
desc.thai: Hoshino leaves school and has a meeting with the Black Suit. Black Suit repurposes the so-called "proposal", claiming to give her "a condition that she'll never be able to decline".
desc.ko: Hoshino leaves school and has a meeting with the Black Suit. Black Suit repurposes the so-called "proposal", claiming to give her "a condition that she'll never be able to decline".
desc.zh_tw: 星野离开了学校，去见了黑服。黑服重新提起了所谓提案，并声称会给她一个“无法拒绝的条件”。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 星野离开了学校，去见了黑服。黑服重新提起了所谓提案，并声称会给她一个“无法拒绝的条件”。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 星野离开了学校，去见了黑服。黑服重新提起了所谓提案，并声称会给她一个“无法拒绝的条件”。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 星野离开了学校，去见了黑服。黑服重新提起了所谓提案，并声称会给她一个“无法拒绝的条件”。

desc.en: The 27th track in Blue Archive, used especially when the player loses the battle.
desc.jp: The 27th track in Blue Archive, used especially when the player loses the battle.
desc.thai: The 27th track in Blue Archive, used especially when the player loses the battle.
desc.ko: The 27th track in Blue Archive, used especially when the player loses the battle.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第二十七首曲子，尤其用于玩家输掉一场战斗后。
desc.zh_tw: The 27th track in Blue Archive, used especially when the player loses the battle.

desc.en: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.jp: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.thai: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.ko: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.zh_tw: 黑色西服人是蔚藍檔案中的反派角色，隸屬於組織“數祕會”。其主要目標是研究基沃託斯中的神祕，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多個故事中均有出現。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 黑色西服人是蔚蓝档案中的反派角色，隶属于组织“数秘会”。其主要目标是研究基沃托斯中的神秘，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多个故事中均有出现。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 黑色西服人是蔚蓝档案中的反派角色，隶属于组织“数秘会”。其主要目标是研究基沃托斯中的神秘，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多个故事中均有出现。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 黑色西服人是蔚蓝档案中的反派角色，隶属于组织“数秘会”。其主要目标是研究基沃托斯中的神秘，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多个故事中均有出现。
